name: df-xms
body: |- wceq(cxms, crab(s0, ctps, wceq(cfv(ctopn, cv(s0)), cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(cds, cv(s0)), cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, cv(s0))))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ *MetSp = { s0 ∈ TopSp |(TopOpen ` s0)=(MetOpen `((dist ` s0)|`((Base ` s0)×(Base ` s0))))}
comment: Define the (proper) class of extended metric spaces. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
